Soliloquy
In drama, where a character speaks to themselves, representing their inner thoughts or feeling and in theprocess replaying them to the audiance (But not to other characters.)
Monologue
In drama, where a character speaks their thoughts out loud to store them with the audiance and any other characters present.
Aside
In drama, where a character shares a comment only with the audiance for humorous or dramatic effect. This is usally a feeling, thought, or piece of additional background information.
